resources.string: Tip: Try to finish the activity or roate the screen when an obserable is emitting items.
Create a Flowable that will emit an item every 2 seconds.
Create a Observable that will emit an item every 2 seconds.
Create a Completable that will complete after 3 seconds.
Create a Single that will emit a single item after 3 seconds.
Create a Maybe that will emit a single item after 3 seconds.
